description: DIMO is an open protocol using blockchain to establish universal digital vehicle identity, permissions, data transmission, vehicle control, and payments. Developers use DIMO to build apps based on connected vehicles around the world while the vehicle owners benefit from monetizing their vehicle data.

actions.name: telemetry-custom-query
actions.description: Query DIMO Telemetry API using a custom GraphQL query.

actions.description: Generates the VIN VC for a given vehicle.

actions.name: device-definitions-decode-vin
actions.description: Submits a decoding request for vehicle identification number, returns the device definition ID corresponding to the VIN.
